title.rendered: STEDI SWITCH PANEL TO SUIT FORD RANGER MK2 MK3 RAPTOR AND EVEREST

content.rendered:
STEDI Ford Ranger, Raptor and Everest Switch panel

JUST THE WAY YOU LIKE IT.

Nothing escapes our design scrutiny. The fit, surface texture and design geometry are all carefully considered to elevate the experience inside the cabin.

DRIVER-FOCUSED.

The angle of our switch panel makes our solution feel familiar from the moment you sit down. Unlike other offerings on the market, the STEDI Ford switch fascia is easily located and intuitively designed to minimise the time looking away from the road.

INSTALLS IN SECONDS, NOT HOURS.

Forget about trying to locate your trim removal tool and stressing about breaking clips and stock parts. Our fascia installs in seconds (literally) without requiring any factory trim removal.

DETAILS

STEDI all-new Ford switch fascia to suit the Ford Ranger PX2, PX3, Ranger Raptor and Everest, effortlessly solves the lack of switch blanks in the aforementioned Ford models.

The STEDI switch panel requires no modification whatsoever to the original dash. Unlike alternate solutions, our installation process is completely non-intrusive, meaning you do not need to remove any console or trim pieces for the installation. Switch wiring aside, the fascia panel can be fitted in under 60 seconds.

Compatible with our entire range of Square Type Pushes switches, which have O.E like latching feedback.

STEDI Registered Design 201916784

Switches and blanks sold separately.

SPECIFICATIONS

MATERIAL INJECTION MOULDED PLASTIC
COMPATIBILITY
FORD RANGER 2015 to current | World Wide
FORD EVEREST 2015 to current | World Wide
FORD RANGER RAPTOR 2018 to current | World Wide

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Ford Switch Panel

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI SWITCH PANEL TO SUIT FORD RANGER MK2 MK3 RAPTOR AND EVEREST

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
